longBusinessSummary: International Iconic Gold Exploration Corp. engages in acquiring, exploring, and evaluating mineral resource properties in Argentina. It explores for gold, silver, zinc, lead, indium, and copper deposits. The company holds interest in the San Roque property that consists of 14 mineral tenures covering an area of 88,057.62 hectares located in the province of Rio Negro, Argentina. It also holds other gold mineral exploration properties, such as Ortiquita property, Castaño property, and Lago Fontana, as well as other mineral exploration properties, including Las Aguilas property, Carachi Pampa IV lithium bateria property. The company was formerly known as Marifil Mines Limited and changed its name to International Iconic Gold Exploration Corp. in September 2021. International Iconic Gold Exploration Corp. was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Robert J. Abenante BBA, CA, MPAcc
companyOfficers.title: Chairman, CEO & President
